AI Description: CusparseLT library is a lightweight version of NVIDIA's cuSPARSE library designed for sparse matrix operations on NVIDIA GPUs. It offers high-performance accelerated computation for sparse matrix manipulation in GPU-accelerated applications.
Core Features:
1. Sparse matrix-vector multiplication (SpMV)
2. Sparse matrix solution (Ax = b) for linear systems
3. Support for various sparse matrix formats
4. GPU acceleration for faster computation
5. Integration with CUDA programming model
